premium.title: Go Premium
premium.restoreError: Unable to restore purchase, please try again.
premium.description: Fully enjoy your hiking app with the Premium plan. It offers you more freedom and extra tools to share your favorite moments.
premium.offeringTitle: What the Premium Plan offers you:

allTrails.title: All Trails:
allTrails.description: Access our entire catalog of hikes. No limits, so you don't miss any of your explorations.

noLogo.title: Photos without Watermark:
noLogo.description: Share your hiking photos without the app's logo. Your memories remain entirely yours.

allStickers.title: All Stickers:
allStickers.description: Get unlimited access to all the app's exclusive stickers to customize your shares and highlight your progress on social media.

errors.share: An error occurred while sharing the image.
errors.premium: An error occurred during the purchase. Please try again.
